item.title: MIUI V13.0.5.0.SKAEUXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 11 Ultra EEA

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.5.0.SKAEUXM | 12.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 229ec26f5e5359143bb30c3f19d2c0d2

Changelog:
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.6 GB

MD5: ccc25df1dc51a9964a6598246f3dd1d7

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Issues with the search bar while switching from landscape to portrait orientation
Fix: Carrier names weren't displayed correctly after being edited
Fix: Amap and other similar apps turned off portable hotspot
Fix: Multiple popups appeared while some Bluetooth earphones were being connected
Fix: Problems with NetEase Music lyrics
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.

Download: Here
